Get/set control file contents

Source: R/nm-gettersetters.R
ctl_contents.Rd

This function is an alias for based_on().

ctl_contents(...)

Arguments

...

Arguments to be passed to based_on().

Value

An nm object with modified ctl_contents field.

Examples


# create example object m1 from package demo files
exdir <- system.file("extdata", "examples", "theopp", package = "NMproject")
m1 <- new_nm(run_id = "m1", 
             based_on = file.path(exdir, "Models", "ADVAN2.mod"),
             data_path = file.path(exdir, "SourceData", "THEOPP.csv"))
             
m1 %>% ctl_contents()
#> $`execute.Models/m1`
#> $PROB
#>   1| ;; 1. Based on: NA
#>   2| ;; 2. Description: 1CMT+oral
#>   3| ;; x1. Author: runner
#>   4| 
#>   5| $PROBLEM ...
#>   6| 
#>   7| ;; 4. Date: 01.01.2011
#>   8| ;; 5. Version: 1
#>   9| ;; 6. Label:
#>  10| ;; Basic model
#>  11| ;; 7. Structural model:
#>  12| ;; One compartment model
#>  13| ;; 8. Covariate model:
#>  14| ;; No covariates
#>  15| ;; 9. Inter-individual variability:
#>  16| ;; CL and V1.
#>  17| ;; 10. Inter-occasion variability:
#>  18| ;; No IOV
#>  19| ;; 11. Residual variability:
